msg: YARN-99. Modify private distributed cache to localize files such that no local directory hits unix file count limits and thus prevent job failures. Contributed by Omkar Vinit Joshi.

msg: HDFS-3940. Add Gset#clear method and clear the block map when namenode is shutdown. Contributed by Suresh Srinivas.
